title: La Zanahoria
subtitle: The Carrot
meta_desc: Learn nutrition vocabulary in Spanish (zanahoria, naranja, crujiente, nutritiva) with audio pronunciation and word highlighting. Ages 2-5.
keywords: learn Spanish preschool, Spanish nutrition book, la zanahoria Spanish, bilingual children books, Spanish vocabulary kids
